This Week in F-Droid
TWIF curated on Thursday, 25 Jul 2024, Week 30

F-Droid core

Recently, we rolled out a new AntiFeature - Tethered Network Services.  It’s introduced to solve a long-standing issue in the NonFreeNet AntiFeature: What does “NonFree” here mean.  All these years we have marked apps relying on web services that can’t be customized with the NonFreeNet AntiFeature and this caused confusion since many users thought that the marked apps rely on web services running non-free software...
